home.title: Hello!, my name is
home.name: Daniel Cabral.
home.description: I'm a Passionate Frontend Developer with a keen eye for detail and a creative approach to solving complex problems. Proficient in translating design concepts into responsive and user-friendly interfaces. A dedicated professional committed to staying abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my projects that i've been working on

project_1.title: GameNest (In progress)
project_1.description: Currently developing a service that will provide a way to find games, save them to a collection, track them, read/create game reviews you've played, and more. In it, I'm applying best practices, user authentication, email validation, testing, among others.

project_2.title: DonC Alojamientos
project_2.description: I designed a service for booking houses, hotels, etc. In it, I utilized techniques to allow users to book a service and even publish their own service.

project_3.title: Dog360
project_3.description: I worked on a project where users could view different dog breeds, see their characteristics, among other features.

project_4.title: Dawson E-commerce
project_4.description: I participated in a team to develop an E-Commerce platform using the SCRUM methodology. We implemented features to view product details, add them to a shopping cart, among other functionalities.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: If you want to contact me, you can do it through my email or my social networks.
